message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product and would like to make a counteroffer of $85.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $92.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $88.
I understand you're getting close to the price you're willing to pay, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $91. It's a great deal for both of us!
